Text.Page:
What do you mean, "What's up?" Only the sky! Is that a trick question, ?

'Cause I like tricks!"Who doesn't?"

Exactly! But it's no fun when you're the target of the trick, and that's what happened to me!

A gang of faeries took my faerie dust, and they won't give it back.

Can you get it back from them?

Yes! Faerie dust! Straight from the faeries!

Look at me! I'm glowing! I'm shiny! Now that's a trick, eh?

Oh, don't be a poor sport, . Maybe it wasn't exactly "my" faerie dust.

But look at meâ€”I'm twinkling!
The faeries took my faerie dust. Don't you believe me?
